name: Take You There
description:
Use the mouse to hold and follow. There is a flower field somewhere in the scene. They might want to take you there. (Recommended to play with an external mouse rather than a touchpad.)

It's a game about learning how to hold hands in a virtual world. The control is inspired by ALEKS WANG's Edgerunner.

　
【Music】

"Underwater Exploration" by Godmode
